mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog.weibo(content, created, user_id) VALUES (#{content}, #{created}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT w.id, w.content, u.nickname FROM blog.weibo w JOIN blog.user u on u.id = w.user_id ORDER BY w.created DESC
SELECT w.id, w.content, u.nickname FROM blog.weibo w JOIN blog.user u on u.id = w.user_id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT w.content, w.created, w.id, u.nickname FROM blog.weibo w Join blog.user u on u.id = w.user_id WHERE w.id = #{id}
